com.rbbn.cpaas.mobile.messaging.chat.api

Interface ChatConversation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Conversation

    public interface ChatConversation
extends Conversation
    Interface to expose ChatConversation SDK methods

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteGroupChatMessage(java.lang.String messageID, MessagingCallback callback)
      Delete the specified group chat message, associated with this conversation, from the server.
      void extend(java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String image, java.lang.String groupName, boolean isOpen, java.util.List<ChatGroupParticipant> participants, FetchGroupCallback callback)
      Extends the one-to-one chat conversation into a group chat conversation.
      void fetchGroupChatMessage(java.lang.String messageID, FetchMessageCallback callback)
      Fetch the specified group message, associated with this conversation, from the server.
      void fetchGroupChatMessages(int count, FetchMessagesCallback callback)
      Retrieve at most 'count' group messages associated with this conversation from the server.
      void sendComposing(boolean isActive, MessagingCallback callback)
      Send an active or idle isComposing status to the participant
      void sendDisplayed(java.lang.String messageID, MessagingCallback callback)
      Send a chat message status as Displayed
      void sendGroupChatComposing(boolean isActive, MessagingCallback callback)
      Sends an active or idle isComposing status to the group
      void sendGroupChatDisplayed(java.lang.String messageId, MessagingCallback callback)
      Send a group chat's message status as Displayed
      void sendGroupChatMessage(OutboundMessage message, MessagingCallback callback)
      Send the group chat message to the backend On success, the message object is internally updated with the server's response data

      • Methods inherited from interface com.rbbn.cpaas.mobile.messaging.api.Conversation

        deleteConversation, deleteMessage, fetchMessage, fetchMessages, fetchMessages, getFirstMessageTime, getLastMessageTime, getLastPullTime, getLastReceivedMessageTime, getLastText, getLength, getLocalAddress, getParticipant, send

    • Method Detail

      • fetchGroupChatMessages

        void fetchGroupChatMessages(int count,
                            FetchMessagesCallback callback)
        Retrieve at most 'count' group messages associated with this conversation from the server. The message list will be returned in the callback
        Parameters:
        count - the number of messages to retrieve from the server
        callback - a callback function to the calling application

      • fetchGroupChatMessage

        void fetchGroupChatMessage(java.lang.String messageID,
                           FetchMessageCallback callback)
        Fetch the specified group message, associated with this conversation, from the server.
        Parameters:
        messageID - the ID of the message to retrieve from the server
        callback - a callback function to the calling application

      • deleteGroupChatMessage

        void deleteGroupChatMessage(java.lang.String messageID,
                            MessagingCallback callback)
        Delete the specified group chat message, associated with this conversation, from the server.
        Parameters:
        messageID - the ID of the message to delete from the server
        callback - a callback function to the calling application

      • sendGroupChatMessage

        void sendGroupChatMessage(OutboundMessage message,
                          MessagingCallback callback)
        Send the group chat message to the backend On success, the message object is internally updated with the server's response data
        Parameters:
        message - the group chat message to send
        callback - a callback function to the calling application

      • extend

        void extend(java.lang.String subject,
            java.lang.String image,
            java.lang.String groupName,
            boolean isOpen,
            java.util.List<ChatGroupParticipant> participants,
            FetchGroupCallback callback)
        Extends the one-to-one chat conversation into a group chat conversation.
        Parameters:
        subject - the group subject
        image - the group image
        groupName - the group name
        isOpen - the group type, open or closed
        participants - list of group participants
        callback - a callback function to the calling application

      • sendComposing

        void sendComposing(boolean isActive,
                   MessagingCallback callback)
        Send an active or idle isComposing status to the participant
        Parameters:
        isActive - true=active, false=idle
        callback - a callback function to the calling application

      • sendDisplayed

        void sendDisplayed(java.lang.String messageID,
                   MessagingCallback callback)
        Send a chat message status as Displayed
        Parameters:
        messageID - the message ID
        callback - a callback function to the calling application

      • sendGroupChatComposing

        void sendGroupChatComposing(boolean isActive,
                            MessagingCallback callback)
        Sends an active or idle isComposing status to the group
        Parameters:
        isActive - active or idle
        callback - a callback function to the calling application

      • sendGroupChatDisplayed

        void sendGroupChatDisplayed(java.lang.String messageId,
                            MessagingCallback callback)
        Send a group chat's message status as Displayed
        Parameters:
        messageId - the message ID
        callback - a callback function to the calling application
